nodes.text: The Servo-Lifter V-2z was a powersuit from Verekil that vaguely resembled a Binary loadlifter with a pilot seat on top. It was described as a "servo-enhanced exo-skeleton." Three meters tall, it had two arms, two legs, and two lifting forks. The suit could move at 90 kmh and lift up to 1.5 metric tons; it was commonly used to move heavy cargo in and out of freighters. It cost 10,000 credits new (7,000 credits used).
